task.title: Making Avacado Breakfast Toast
task.shortdesc: This quick and easy breakfast is perfect for when you're in a rush to explore the New River Valley!

taskbody.prereq:
Make sure you have all the ingredients. You'll need:
2 slices sandwich bread
A few slivers of white onion
1 cup of refried beans
1 thinly sliced avacado
Coarse sea salt

step.cmd: Toast the bread to your desired level of doneness.
Use a knife to slice the white onions

substep.cmd: Place them off to the side to top your finished product

step.cmd: Warm the refried beans in a skillet.
Place the toast on your plate and top with the warmed refried beans.
Top the toast with the thinly sliced avacados and white onions
Sprinkle coarse sea salt on to taste
